actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to encourage and enable small business concerns which furnish retail business establishments with security services to provide better training for their security personnel.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to authorize grants to cover the expense of training security personnel by the Law Enforcement Assistance Administration of small business concerns which furnish retail business establishments with security services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to encourage and enable small business concerns which furnish retail business establishments with security services to provide better training for their security personnel.
